name: deZert
description:
This is a game I made for another school project!

-------------------------------------------------------------

This is a 2D topdown zombie shooter in which you have to fight zombies/creatures that want to eat you. It's a pretty simple concept, but fun to play!

-------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

RightMouseButton or WASD/ArrowKeys (you can change it in the options) to WALK

LeftMouseButton to Shoot

ESC for PauseMenu

-------------------------------------------------------------

Made by BuckO and The Cheddar
